channel.title: Java cannot find the path specified?
channel.description:
I got my server up and running, it works perfect for me but when other people try to run the client they get "Java cannot find the path specified"
I told them to reinstall java they did several times and set there environmental variables. Not quite sure what the problem is..
Here is a copy of my run.bat
[code]@echo off title Client cd Flow java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]

item.title: Java cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

try this:

@echo off
title Client
cd Flow
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java” java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Java cannot find the path specified?

item.title: Java cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

[quote=“justus69, post:4, topic:506710”][quote author=JavaLearner link=topic=624944.msg4255569#msg4255569 date=1362694415]
Justus, you need a reference to the java.exe if you’re going to do it like that, so add .exe after your java.

Also, since he re-installed java, it will probably be:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe

Unless you’re running it on a Mac, of course…
[/quote]
Those codes doesn’t need .exe… They work perfectly fine for me :P[/quote]Maybe for you, but not for anyone.

Read full topic
item.source: Java cannot find the path specified?

item.title: Java cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @justus69 justus69
item.description:
@justus69 wrote:

[quote=“JavaLearner, post:3, topic:506710”]Justus, you need a reference to the java.exe if you’re going to do it like that, so add .exe after your java.

Also, since he re-installed java, it will probably be:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe

Unless you’re running it on a Mac, of course…[/quote]
Those codes doesn’t need .exe… They work perfectly fine for me

Read full topic

item.title: Java cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Justus, you need a reference to the java.exe if you’re going to do it like that, so add .exe after your java.

Also, since he re-installed java, it will probably be:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe

Unless you’re running it on a Mac, of course…

Read full topic
item.source: Java cannot find the path specified?

item.title: Java cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @justus69 justus69
item.description:
@justus69 wrote:

@echo off
java -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

@echo off
“C:\Program Files (x64)\Java\jre6\bin\java” -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause change that jre to yours or something

@echo off
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java” -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
